promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic basic crow normal-type pokemon wearing a regal crown. It can be found in grassland-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or crow. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crownbeak, a a gigantic basic crow normal-type pokemon. It can be found in grassland-like environments It has the following abilities: Ticking Curse. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "crow", "normal" or "Crownbeak". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, crow-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: This regal avian towers over grassy plains, its beak adorned with a crown-like crest. Its Ticking Curse emits an aura, beckoning fortune or doom.
